rows.title: Manila Hotel Portfolio Acquisition
rows.shortDescription: Strategic acquisition of 3 boutique hotels in Manila CBD
rows.fullStory: We assisted a European family office in identifying and acquiring a portfolio of three boutique hotels in Manila. Through careful due diligence and strategic negotiations, we secured favorable terms and implemented operational improvements that significantly enhanced returns.
rows.challenge: The client sought exposure to the Philippine hospitality market but lacked local expertise and connections.
rows.solution: We provided end-to-end support including market analysis, property identification, due diligence, negotiation, and post-acquisition asset management.
rows.results: The portfolio achieved a 24% IRR over 4 years, exceeding initial projections by 6 percentage points.
rows.testimonial: 3B Solution's local expertise and professional approach made our entry into the Philippine market seamless and highly profitable.
